metadata.name: Singularity 2
metadata.description:
Artist: Claudio Valdebenito is a multidisciplinary artist motivated by developing narratives around themes of posthumanism, AI, transhumanism, metaverse, identity, time and memory, and ancient culture. Adopting a critical stance, he investigates what it means to live in a digital age.

Description: The artist is inspired by the concepts such as posthumanism, transhumanism, and the relationship between human and nature in this digital age.

Technique: The artwork is digitally created by using Generative Adversarial Networks.
